notes:
Meeting held on October 14, 2025

Key Discussion Points:

1. Q4 Objectives Overview
   - Launch new product line in October
   - Expand marketing budget by 15%
   - Hire 3 additional team members for growth
   - Focus on customer retention metrics

2. Budget Allocation
   - Marketing: $150,000 additional budget approved
   - Product Development: $200,000 for new features
   - Hiring: $180,000 for new positions

3. Timeline and Milestones
   - Product launch: October 15, 2025
   - Marketing campaign start: October 1, 2025
   - New hire onboarding: By November 1, 2025

4. Key Decisions Made
   - Approved 15% budget increase for marketing
   - Set product launch date for Oct 15
   - Agreed on hiring priorities (2 engineers, 1 designer)
   - Committed to weekly status meetings

5. Risks and Mitigation
   - Risk: Tight timeline for product launch
   - Mitigation: Added 2-week buffer, daily standups
   - Risk: Finding qualified candidates
   - Mitigation: Engaged with recruitment agency

6. Next Steps
   - Team leads to create detailed project plans
   - HR to post job openings by end of week
   - Marketing to present campaign proposal next Monday
   - Product team to finalize specifications by Friday

action_items.task: Finalize product specifications and technical requirements
Post job openings for 2 engineers and 1 designer
Set up daily standup meetings for product team
Create detailed Q4 project timeline in Microsoft Planner
